original_text: By faith he kept the Passover and the application of blood, so that the destroyer of the firstborn would not touch the firstborn of Israel.
korean_text: 믿음으로 유월절과 피 뿌리는 예식을 정하였으니 이는 장자를 멸하는 자로 그들을 건드리지 않게 하려 한 것이며

sentences.original_text: By faith he kept the Passover
so that the destroyer of the firstborn
would not touch the firstborn of Israel
